import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const Products = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const getProductData = async () => { try { const res = await fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products") const actualData = await res.json(); setData(actualData) } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } useEffect(() => { getProductData(); }, []) return ( <>

  • -------FunCart Top 3 Deal------



    {data[0].title}

    Price: {data[0].price}



    {data[0].description}

    {data[0].category}





  • {data.title}

    Price: {data.price}



    {data.description}

    {data.category}





  • {data.title}

    Price: {data.price}



    {data.description}

    {data.category}



) } export default Products
